General.Name: niiio finance group AG
General.Description: niiio finance group AG provides cloud-based software-as-a-service solutions for banks and financial service providers. The company offers ESG/sustainability, portfolio management, risk management, order and execution management, advisory and financial planning, robo-advisory, client onboarding, client portal, analytics, client reporting, and billing solutions, as well as CRM for ongoing client management. It also provides algorithms and risk-engine, API platform, 360 customer portal, asset management, order-routing, digital advisory and wealth management, and custodian and multibanking. niiio finance group AG is based in Görlitz, Germany.
